comments.author: ryan.grossman@yahoo.com
comments.creator: ryan.grossman@yahoo.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.2; rv:2.0b10) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b10
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.2; rv:2.0b10) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b10

The Error Console States:

Error: this.DropDownPlaceholder is null
Source File: http://connect.hartcorp.com/hart11dev/RadControls/ComboBox/Scripts/2_8_8/RadComboBox.js
Line: 346


Line in js file is: this.DropDownPlaceholder.onselectstart=function(){


Error happens after a RadAjaxPanel refresh. Was 100% working until Beta 8 which broke it. I have reverted back to Beta 7 until resolved.


Reproducible: Always

Reproducible: Always
Is this still an Issue using Firefox 4 final Version and/or against a more recent RadControls JS Library Version?
comments.creator: xtc4uall@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: Is this still an Issue using Firefox 4 final Version and/or against a more recent RadControls JS Library Version?
comments.author: xtc4uall@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
This remains an issue with final release. I'm not sure if this is an issue with a more recent Telerik control suite. This is the latest copy of the control for the version of .net we are running.

This was last working in Beta 7. Something happened between beta 7 and beta 8. Unfortunately, my users will have to remain on version 3 or Google chrome until resolved.
